tit.j: 津山エクスプレス京都号

sen.j: 津山エクスプレス京都号（つやまエクスプレスきょうとごう）は、西日本ジェイアールバス、神姫バスの2社によって共同運行される京都府京都市・乙訓郡大山崎町・大阪府高槻市と兵庫県加東市・加西市・宍粟市・岡山県美作市・勝田郡勝央町・津山市を結ぶ中国自動車道の昼行高速バス路線である。
sen.e: Tsuyama Express Kyoto-Go is a daytime express bus route of Chugoku Expressway by joint operation of the two companies, West Japan JR Bus Company and Shinki Bus, that connects Kyoto City and Oyamazaki-cho, Otokuni-gun, Kyoto Prefecture, Takatsuki City, Osaka Prefecture with Kato City, Kasai City, and Shiso City, Hyogo Prefecture, Mimasaka City, Shoo-cho, Katsuta-gun, and Tsuyama City, Okayama Prefecture.
sen.cmt: http://www.kakuyasubus.jp/kansai_chugoku/tsuyama_express/index.html 都市名の表記に関して：カンマでつなげると、どこからどこまでが、どの県に含まれるのかが明瞭でなくなるのではないかと感じ、次のような訳も考えました。Tsuyama Express Kyoto-Go is a daytime express bus route of Chugoku Expressway by joint operation of the two companies, West Japan JR Bus Company and Shinki Bus, that connects Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Oyamazaki-cho, Otokuni-gun, Kyoto Prefecture, and Takatsuki City, Osaka Prefecture with Kato City, Hyogo Prefecture, Kasai City, Hyogo Prefecture, Shiso City, Hyogo Prefecture, Mimasaka City, Okayama Prefecture, Shoo-cho, Katsuta-gun, Okayama Prefecture, and Tsuyama City, Okayama Prefecture.
sen.e: Tsuyama Express Kyoto-go is a daytime express bus route of Chugoku Expressway by joint operation of the two companies, West Japan JR Bus Company and Shinki Bus, that connects Kyoto City (Kyoto Prefecture) and Tsuyama City (Okayama Prefecture) via Oyamazaki-cho (Otokuni-gun, Kyoto Prefecture), Takatsuki City (Osaka Prefecture) and Kato City/Kasai City/Shiso City (Hyogo Prefecture), Mimasaka City/Shoo-cho (Katsuta-gun) (Okayama Prefecture).
sen.cmt: go小文字にしました。読みやすくするため表記訂正しました。
sen.e: Tsuyama Express Kyoto-go is a daytime express bus route of Chugoku Expressway by joint operation of the two companies, West Japan JR Bus Company and Shinki Bus, that connects Kyoto City (Kyoto Prefecture) and Tsuyama City (Okayama Prefecture) via Oyamazaki-cho (Otokuni-gun, Kyoto Prefecture), Takatsuki City (Osaka Prefecture) and Kato City/Kasai City/Shiso City (Hyogo Prefecture), Mimasaka City/Shoo-cho (Katsuta-gun) (Okayama Prefecture).

sen.j: 全便座席指定制のため、乗車には予約が必要。
sen.e: Reservation is required for boarding due to the reserved-seat system on entire services.
Reservation is required for boarding due to the reserved-seat system on entire services.
Reservation is required for boarding due to the reserved-seat system on entire services.

sen.j: ただし、兵庫県内 - 岡山県内相互間（滝野社インターチェンジ - 津山駅相互間）の利用は、空席がある場合に限られ、自由席となり、予約はできない。
sen.e: However, between internal Hyogo Prefecture to internal Okayama Prefecture (between Takinoyashiro Interchange and the Tsuyama Station) seats become non-reserved only when there are vacancies, and reservation is not available.

However, between internal Hyogo Prefecture to internal Okayama Prefecture (between Takinoyashiro Interchange and Tsuyama Station) seats become non-reserved only when there are vacancies, and reservation is not available.
sen.cmt: 不要なスペースを削除しました。the 削除しました。
sen.e: However, between internal Hyogo Prefecture to internal Okayama Prefecture (between Takinoyashiro Interchange and Tsuyama Station) seats become non-reserved only when there are vacancies, and reservation is not available.
Service identification number is 290xx.
Service identification number is 290xx.
Service identification number is 290xx.

sen.j: 西日本ジェイアールバス
sen.e: West Japan JR Bus Company
West Japan JR Bus Company
West Japan JR Bus Company

sen.j: 京都営業所が2往復を担当。
sen.e: The Kyoto office is in charge of 2 round services.
The Kyoto office is in charge of 2 round services.
The Kyoto office is in charge of 2 round services.

sen.j: ただし、予約センターは大阪にある。
sen.e: However, reservation center is in Osaka.
However, reservation center is in Osaka.
However, reservation center is in Osaka.

sen.j: 津山側起終点「津山駅」バス停から西日本ジェイアールバス津山車庫（岡山県津山市二宮にある操車場、中鉄バス「松原中」バス停に併設）まで回送として運転され方向転換、時間調整する。
sen.e: It runs out-of-service from the "Tsuyama Station" bus stop which is the terminus on Tsuyama side, up to West Japan JR Bus Company Tsuyama depot (a yard in Ninomiya, Tsuyama City, Okayama Prefecture which is an annex to "Matsuharanaka" bus stop of Chutetsu Bus), then makes a change of direction and time adjustment.
sen.cmt: 松原中の読みが調べきれませんでした。大変申し訳ありません。
sen.e: It runs out-of-service from 'Tsuyama Station' bus stop which is the terminus on Tsuyama side, up to West Japan JR Bus Company Tsuyama depot (a yard in Ninomiya, Tsuyama City, Okayama Prefecture which is an annex to 'Matsubaranaka' bus stop of Chutetsu Bus), then makes a change of direction and time adjustment.
sen.cmt: the 削除しました。原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。Matsubaranakaに訂正しました。
sen.e: It runs out-of-service from 'Tsuyama Station' bus stop which is the terminus on Tsuyama side, up to West Japan JR Bus Company Tsuyama depot (a yard in Ninomiya, Tsuyama City, Okayama Prefecture which is an annex to 'Matsubaranaka' bus stop of Chutetsu Bus), then makes a change of direction and time adjustment.

sen.j: 津山営業所が2往復を担当。
sen.e: The Tsuyama office is in charge of 2 round services.
The Tsuyama office is in charge of 2 round services.
The Tsuyama office is in charge of 2 round services.

sen.j: ただし、予約センターは神戸にある。
sen.e: However, the reservation center is in Kobe.
However, the reservation center is in Kobe.
However, the reservation center is in Kobe.
Stations and Stops
Stations and Stops
Stations and Stops

sen.j: ▼…下りは乗車のみ、上りは降車のみの扱い
sen.e: ▼///Boarding only for down-bound, alighting only for up-bound.
sen.cmt: 他にこのような訳も検討致しました。▼･･･Pick up only for Hyogo and Okayama bound, set down only for Kyoto and Osaka bound.
sen.e: Karasuma Exit of Kyoto Station: It operates only boarding for down-bound (Kyoto - Tsuyama) and only alighting for up-bound (Tsuyama - Kyoto).
sen.cmt: Web原文を確認したところ、記号は表の各停留所に対応していました。追加の説明が必要だと思います。「京都駅烏丸口: 下り（京都-津山)は乗車のみ、上り(津山-京都)は降車のみ可能」として訂正しました。記号削除しました。Karasuma Exit of に訂正しました。
sen.e: Karasuma Exit of Kyoto Station: It operates only boarding for down-bound (Kyoto - Tsuyama) and only alighting for up-bound (Tsuyama - Kyoto).

sen.j: ▲…上りは乗車のみ、下りは降車のみの扱い
sen.e: ▲///Boarding only for up-bound, alighting only for down-bound.
sen.cmt: 他にこのような訳も検討致しました。▲･･･Pick up only for Kyoto and Osaka bound, Set down only for Hyogo and Okayama bound.
sen.e: Tsuyama Interchange (Chugoku Expressway)/Tsuyama Station: It operates only boarding for up-bound (Tsuyama - Kyoto) and only alighting for down-bound (Kyoto - Tsuyama).
sen.cmt: 「津山IC（中国道）・津山駅: 上り（津山-京都)は乗車のみ、下り(京都-津山)は降車のみ可能」として訂正しました。記号削除しました。
sen.e: Tsuyama Interchange (Chugoku Expressway)/Tsuyama Station: It operates only boarding for up-bound (Tsuyama - Kyoto) and only alighting for down-bound (Kyoto - Tsuyama).

sen.j: ◆…双方向乗車可能（ただし、津山方面への乗降は空席がある場合のみ可）
sen.e: ◆///Boarding is possible for both ways (However, boarding and alighting for Ttsuyama direction is available only when there are vacant seats.)
sen.cmt: 他にこのような訳も検討致しました。◆･･･Pick up for both ways are possible (However, pick up and set down for Tsuyama direction is available only when there are vacant seats.)
sen.e: Takinoyashiro Interchange/Hojo/Yamazaki Interchange/Sakuto/Mimasaka Interchange/Chugoku Katsumada (Chugoku Expressway): It operates both boarding and alighting only when there are vacant seats.
sen.cmt: Tsuyamaスペル訂正しました。「滝野社IC（中国道）・北条（中国道）・山崎IC（中国道）・作東（中国道）・美作IC（中国道）・中国勝間田（中国道）: 上り下りとも乗車が可能（ただし、津山方面への乗車は空席がある場合のみ可能」として訂正しました。記号削除しました。
sen.e: Takinoyashiro Interchange/Hojo/Yamazaki Interchange/Sakuto/Mimasaka Interchange/Chugoku Katsumada (Chugoku Expressway): It operates both boarding and alighting only when there are vacant seats.

sen.j: 滝野社インターチェンジ - 津山駅相互間の利用は空席がある場合のみ可。
sen.e: Usage between Takinoyashiro Interchange and the Tsuyama Station is possible only when there are vacant seats.
The bus service is usable between Takinoyashiro Interchange and the Tsuyama Station only when there are vacant seats.
The bus service is usable between Takinoyashiro Interchange and the Tsuyama Station only when there are vacant seats.
